text: Haq 744TAf 4feqrut (Tsm @Rae7 3 {oTNf 4A4) aTH9 / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 Y87 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) m-5 Vq 6, 8az7-10, ERVT, # forit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines Dispute Resolution & Legal Matters/2020 Policy No: 2.1.40/2020 dated 12th June, 2020 (Decision taken on E-Office F No.NHAI/DRB/202O (Comp No.3033) Sub: Delegation of Power to RO for signing for Supplementary Agreement in ongoing PPP/HIAMEPCI Item Rate Projects for adopting the procedure of Dispute Resolution Board: Vide Policy Guidelines No_ 2.1.37/2020 dated 16.03.2020 &t Corrigendum No. Boa38/2020 dated 13.05.2020,it was directed to adopt the procedure of Dispute Resolution Board (DRB) in all ongoing PPP /HAM/EPC /ltem Rate Projects; Accordingly, the directions were issued to enter into the Supplementary Agreements with all Concessionaires/Contractors €o€ adopting the said procedure of DRB. 2_ In vievv of COVID-19 situation, the problem in travelling of Concessionaires/ Contractors to HQ for signing the agreement has come to the notice of the Competent Authority. 3_ In view of above, the Competent Authority hereby authorise the concerned Regional Officer (CGM or GM rank) to enter into the Supplementary Agreement with the Contractor /Concessionaire besides CGM/GM of concerned Technical Division at HQ: 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (S.K Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All ROs & PDs to: All Members/CVO PS to Chairman All Officers of HQ Hindi Officer for Translation in Hindi Library for hosting the circular on library site.
